snippet: An advisory panel report reflects a view, widely held by current and former national security officials, that far too much information is classified.
abstract: Public Interest Declassification Board publishes report calling for most thorough overhaul of government secrecy since classification procedures were established 70 years ago; findings by the federal advisory panel reflect view, widely held by current and former national security officials, that far too much information is classified.
lead_paragraph: An advisory panel report reflects a view, widely held by current and former national security officials, that far too much information is classified.

headline.seo: Federal Plan Calls for Overhauling Secrecy Policies
headline.main: Federal Plan Calls for Overhauling Secrecy Policies
headline.print_headline: Federal Plan Calls for Overhauling Secrecy Policies to Declassify More Information
